skins.shipDescription: Omaha-class light cruiser ¨C Raleigh, Hull Number CL-7!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the training officer of the Omaha-class fleet - Raleigh. I'm going to be very strict with anyone who won't listen to what I say!
skins.acquisition: I'm Raleigh, the Omaha-class light cruiser. Please sign this contract here... There we go. I'm hoping we'll make a good team from now on, Commander.
skins.login: Hello, Commander. I've been waiting for you. Oh my, look at the time! Shouldn't we start the training now?
skins.details: Make sure you ask me any questions if you're lost before we head out!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Shall we begin our training, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: For a beginner, every bit of training is very important~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: My name is Raleigh, not... that! Also, don't forget the "Ms."!
skins.secretaryTouch: Please don't tug me like that... I'm not a kid!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm not immune to getting angry, you know... Co-man-der!
